about_the_game:
Wartime Glory is a turn-based strategy war game that is a perfect mix of classic board games like Risk with special weapon cards that give it a new dimension of strategy and tactics. Have fun while you take over the world, one country at a time!

Get ready for war! Engage in thrilling multiplayer battles against other commanders from around the world. Test your strategy skills in intense combats while you rise through the ranks, earn glory, and establish yourself as a true world conqueror! With special cards, Wartime Glory introduces a new dimension of strategy. These powerful cards offer unique abilities and advantages, allowing you to leverage your tactics with a whole new world of possibilities! War games have never been so tactical.

Special features of Wartime Glory include:
✔ Online multiplayer in real time 🌎
✔ Practice mode against an incredible artificial intelligence 🤖
✔ War missions and special challenges 🎯
✔ Battle free-for-all or 2v2 🤝
✔ Fight in multiple maps based on historical battles of World War 2 (WW2) 🔁
✔ Historical, national factions as well as funny fantasy ones 🇺🇸🇩🇪🇮🇹🇬🇧🇯🇵🇷🇺
